title: #Vanlife Collides With Costly Fuel
sub_head: Adherents of the free-spirited culture scrap their trips and cut down mileage to save on gas
body:
Would you like to live in a 10-year-old Ford Econoline with a Canadian man youâ€™ve never met? High gasoline prices have Matt Watson looking for a roommate.
#Vanlife, a movement celebrating the thrifty, unencumbered life on the road, is cruising head-on into record prices at the pump. That has pushed devotees to get more creative about making ends meet.
